name: Mahakama-Rama
description:
Kids love gorillas so much that Mahakama has to leave his cushy habitat at the zoo to flee back home just to get some peace and quiet!

Get those pesky kids to leave you alone by feeding them their favorite foods as you try to find a quiet place for Mahakama to call home!

Features
  • Four unique levels depicting different locations
  • Three children, each with their own favorite food item
  • Throw each child's favorite food item to send them back home
  • Keep Mahakama happy by picking up the children's garbage before it hits the ground


This game is a student project made by four students at UCF as part of a Casual Games Production course.

-Each student in alphabetical order-

Kamu Chung-Hoon - Programmer

Rebecca Franco - Artist

Tevin Meredith - Programmer

Kevin Morris - Artist
